caption.p: Schematic diagram of SDE experimental apparatus. Parts of the apparatus are numbered as follows: 1. Thermostat; 2. extraction agent (water); 3. mixing zone of water steam and n-hexane steam; 4. condenser; 5. extraction cell; 6. cooling jacket; 7. phase separation tube; 8. valve; 9. reaction flask containing n-hexane; 10. thermostat; 11. collection bottle.
